title: Telegram NFT Bot
description: Multi-chain Telegram NFT notification bot configurable for multiple NFT collections to send notifications about mints and buys to different Telegram groups.

title: PGENZ Collection
description: The PGENZ Collection is part of the PigeonPark crypto project on Ethereum. As a freelancer, I developed the nft smart contract including randomization, whitelisting, and extendable nft collection as well as the minting app.

title: Cross-chain NFT Collection
description: A pseudo-randomized cross-chain NFT contract (ERC721A) using Chainlink CCIP. The contracts are deployed on BNB and Base chain. BEP-20 tokens and BNB is used for minting whilte the NFTs are created on Base chain.

title: LIQUID Collection
description: NFT Collection including development, testing, and deployment of a smart contract inheriting from ERC721A with a USDC minting fee on Base chain as well as design and development of associated minting DApp.

title: Hold ($EARN)
description: Hold ($EARN) is a crypto project that includes an ERC20 token with a taxation that is redistributed back to holders (reflections). The project extends to two NFT collections based on the ERC721 standard with their own minting DApps.

title: BoredRatMazeClub Website
description: Project website for the cryptocurrency BoredRatMazeClub (CHEESE) using React and hosted on SiteGround.

title: Tactile Scenes
description: A statistical analysis of 3D environments to study the how the brain may efficiently encode tactile sensory information.

title: WHISKiT Physics
description: A simulation framework to model the dynamics of a complete sensorimotor system — the rodent vibrissal array — operating under ethologically relevant conditions to generate synthetic data for research in the fields of neuroscience, information theory, and artificial intelligence.

title: Active Sensing
description: An opinion piece about the term "Active Sensing" and a theoretical framework to analyze active sensing mechanisms based on energetic flow.
